Name: RNDZ RADAR POWER-UP
checklistText:
<size=21>RENDEZVOUS RADAR POWER-UP</size>

Panel 11:
	CB HTR: RNDZ RDR OPR - close (required)
	CB HTR: RNDZ RDR STBY - open (required)

1.	Select display mode:

Panel 3:
	HTR CONT: TEMP MON sel - RNDZ RADAR

2.	Verify rendezvous radar temperature:
	HTR CONT: TEMP ind - >= +10° F

Panel 11:
3.	CB/AC BUS A: RNDZ RDR - close
	Wait 30 sec.
	CB PGNS: RNDZ RDR - close

	RNDZ RADAR: NO TRACK lt - on
